name: Real Traffic Racer 3D
description:
Ever wanted to rush on the highway with a fast car? Safely enjoy the feeling! Real Traffic Racer 3D is the best Highway car racing game you will find out here! Fasten your seat belts and get ready for an onslaught of cars set to come in your path. Be careful with your maneuvering though, crashing into cars hurts! Collect coins while driving to be able to unlock 10 superb car types, each of which is better than the other. The best traffic racing game on the App Store! Speed junkies, slap on your helmet and experience some high-octane racing on asphalt! Zoom down the open highways and try to pass closely without crashing. Dodge the cars swiftly and obtain boosts and shields to increase your score. Boosts will increase the speed of your car and you can crush other cars where as shields will prevent you from getting knocked out while driving.

Game Modes:

One Way:
In this mode you will experience the one direction traffic and you need to drive carefully with expertise.

Two Way:
In this mode you will experience two way traffic load and you have to be care full while over taking other traffic cars.

Game Features:

- Realistic Car Controls
- Realistic Traffic Ai.
- Amazing Highway drive Environment
- Attractive and useful power-ups
- Nice Background Music
- Multiple player cars

How to Play:
Accelerate your car by touching acceleration button on screen, to avoid collusion use car brakes by touching brake button on screen. Change lanes by tilting your mobile sets left/right.

Collect as many coins to unlock new cars or to buy power ups like boosters or shields. There is also an other way to earn game coins. Explore this thrilling game and enjoy. Real Traffic Racer 3D will never let you bore. It is the best Time Killer. Cheers!!
